Keywords: Animal , Arakko , Assassin , Warrior
Real Name: Pogg Ur-Pogg
Special Powers
SWORD BEARER: Pogg Ur-Pogg starts the game with any Sword equipment equipped and can use its EFFECT regardless of being a non-standard character.
AN ENTIRE NEW WORLD TO PLUNDER: When Pogg Ur-Pogg hits a single target with a close attack, you may choose to deal a maximum of 1 damage to a hit target. If you do, unequip that character and if another friendly character is adjacent to Pogg Ur-Pogg or the hit character, you may choose that character to equip the unequipped equipment.
AN ENTIRE WORLD, SAYS YOU?: Charge, Flurry.
NOW I KNOW YOU'RE MY OPPONENT...: STOP. Toughness.

Comments
November 4, 2022
tidge
I am torn on *this* dial. 170 points is a lot to spend on a 12-click giant/colossal, even one that has a full track of Charge and/or Flurry (with a no-cost starting equip of a Sword Object). Thematically I can understand why I see Super Strength, I just wish that it had been traited as it is such a mediocre power in the current (2022) rule set. With his "unequip enemies" potential, I like that he could pick-up/steal (some) objects, but while fun it would be an unreliable strategy. I would probably opt to start him with either Warlock (because he will be targeted) or Light of Galador (because he'll be taking damage). "Floaty" Deadpool from the retail XoS set would be a good buddy for him, forcing opponents to get closer to the big guy.
